statements: DELETE FROM employee_payroll WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND employee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM employee_payroll WHERE salary > 80000 AND (deductions < 5000 OR bonuses > 1000);
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE salary < 50000);
DELETE FROM deductions WHERE employee_id = 101 AND deduction_type = 'Health Insurance';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE name = 'Alice' AND department = 'IT';
DELETE FROM bonuses WHERE bonus_amount > 1000 AND bonus_reason LIKE '%performance%';
DELETE FROM salaries WHERE employee_id = 2002 AND effective_date < '2022-01-01';
